saints.name: Pegasus Seiya
saints.description: A Vitality-type Bronze Saint who's useful in all situations

skills.name: Pegasus Meteor Fist
skills.description:
Slams enemies in front with a Supersonic Fist, Disabling them temporarily.
[Fury Type]

skills.name: Cosmo Burst Upper
skills.description:
A powerful uppercut that can Launch
opponents into the air.
[Physical Type]

[Physical Type]

skills.name: Cosmo Torch
skills.description:
Fighting technique of Saints, burning 
their inner Cosmo.

[Fury Type]
-Always in effect.

skills.name: Seventh Sense
skills.description:
HP of all Bronze Saints are increased
by the awakened Seiya's inspiration.
Also nullifies Knockback for himself.
Effect boosted according to number of Bronze Saints in party.
[Fury Type]
-Always in effect.

skills.name: Combo Plus I
skills.description:
Gets additional Combos during a battle.
[Max Level: 4]
Note: Combo Plus effect can be stacked.
Note: Only activated when this character is included in the Attack party.

saints.name: Dragon Shiryu
saints.description: A Vitality-type Bronze Saint who has exceptional attack power

Ultimate technique of Dragon that can reverse even the flow of Rozan falls.

-Always in effect.

skills.name: Seventh Sense
skills.description:

Shiryu's Cosmo Gauge gradually recovers during battle.
[Fury Type]
-Always in effect.

skills.name: Combo Plus I
skills.description:
Gets additional Combos during a battle.
[Max Level: 4]
Note: Combo Plus effect can be stacked.
Note: Only activated when this character is included in the Attack party.

saints.name: Cygnus Hyoga
saints.description: An Aura-type Bronze Saint who can attack all enemies at once

saints.name: Andromeda Shun

skills.name: Nebula Radiance

The Cosmo deep in Shun’s heart awakens, inspiring his comrades.

skills.name: Seventh Sense
skills.description:
Shun's awakening to the Seventh Sense inspires his comrades,
boosting all allies' Accuracy.
[Fury Type]
-Always in effect.

skills.name: Recovery I (Standard)
skills.description:
Recovers all allies' HP when a battle ends.
[Max Level: 10]
Note1: Recovery effect can be stacked.
Note2: Only activated when assigned as a Defense Saint

saints.name: Phoenix Ikki

skills.name: Score Plus BT I (Standard)
skills.description:

[Max Level: 20]

Note2: If already learned "Lionet Bomber", activates it at the start of a battle.
